pullrequest.title: Issue #73: Optitrack marker arithmetic based on monitor axes

content.raw: I might be wrong but it seems that there are quite a few hardcoded values to represent transformations. It would be nice to have some constants with meaningful names to help reading/debugging/modifying.
content.html: I might be wrong but it seems that there are quite a few hardcoded values to represent transformations. It would be nice to have some constants with meaningful names to help reading/debugging/modifying.
